description: A cursed realm shrouded in eternal night, ruled by forgotten gods and whispered magic.

roles.name: Blood Mage
roles.description: Masters of forbidden rituals who draw power from the very essence of blood. Every spell demands a price—often paid in their own lifeblood. Pain and power are inseparable to them.      Abilities: Blood-fueled magic, life draining, curses, forbidden healing      Archetype: Obsessed scholar, corrupted healer      Weakness: Excessive casting decays their physical body

roles.name: Grave Knight
roles.description: Fallen warriors bound by ancient oaths, resurrected to serve an undying cause. They retain fragmented memories of their former lives, haunted by love, loss, and unfinished duty.      Abilities: Undeath, spectral weapon mastery, death auras      Archetype: Tragic hero, undead guardian      Weakness: Emotional unrest, disjointed memory

roles.name: Eclipse Oracle
roles.description: Born under a lunar eclipse, they see time like shattered mirrors—future, past, and shadowed now. Their visions are cryptic, and their minds exist between dimensions.      Abilities: Prophecy, mind warping, multi-reality awareness      Archetype: Mad seer, cosmic whisperer      Weakness: Fragile sanity, speech often veiled in riddles

roles.name: Lurking Shade
roles.description: Beings of the dark who dwell in the in-between. Assassins, spies, and shadows incarnate. Most are driven by vengeance or bound to shadow pacts.      Abilities: Invisibility, shadowmeld, memory stealing      Archetype: Vengeful ghost, silent stalker      Weakness: Vulnerable in bright light, shadow-bound limits

roles.name: Forbidden Librarian
roles.description: Keepers of ancient, sanity-breaking tomes. They preserve knowledge too dangerous to be read, but are tempted by it all the same. They guide seekers—but at a cost.      Abilities: Knowledge invocation, anti-magic fields, mental gateways      Archetype: Guardian sage, scholar on the edge      Weakness: Mental overload, burdened by cosmic truths
